input.sentences: when i was little | i lived next to the water .
i lived in an apartment building with 5 stories .
i used to wake up every day and admire the statue out front .
it was built to honor world war ii .
every day before bed | i would pray in the community chapel next to my building .
output.sentences: Julie wanted to take us to visit the town she lived in growing up, by the water.
She had so many stories of the buildings she had lived in.
She seemed wide awake showing us the statue by the front of the cathedral.
Another statue that was neat honored those who fought in World War II.
It reminded us that we must be thankful for each day so we stopped at the most beautiful church in the community so that we could pray.
